title: Writing 2 Portfolio
text:
Last spring, I took a writing class in which we were to develop a writing portfolio containing all of the papers we had written in the class.

I spent hours investing time into this class, and seeing all of my hard work presented in a portfolio via an online website seemed to be the most fitting.

Below is a link to my Writing 2 Portfolio:

title: Bianca Berron
text: My name is Bianca Berron and Iâ€™m a second year Environmental Studies (B.S) student at UCSB! Some of my involvements on campus include being on the UCSB Surf Team, Environmental Affairs Board, and the Gaucho Tour Association.

title: About
text:
About this site
In this site you can find some of my proudest work I have completed during my time here at UCSB so far. Each page on this website leads to a different project I have completed over the past two years at UCSB.
